siteTagline: Your all-in-one toolbox for everyday online tasks.
siteDescription: The Online Everything Tool offers a vast collection of free, client-side utilities for data transformation and text manipulation.  It's perfect for developers, data analysts, and anyone needing quick, privacy-focused online tools.
siteBenefits: Access a wide variety of utilities in one place
Transform data quickly using client-side processing
Works offline for many tools due to PWA setup
Contribute new tools easily via the AI-assisted build process
Keep your data private with client-side processing
